lines.text: ...That thing looks... kinda similar to the dead body.
I'm not sure what it means about what the hologram <c=#FF00FF>is,</c> but I bet the <c=#FF00FF>hologram itself</c> is a clue to <c=#FF00FF>some other question.</c>
I mean, it's Slick Emmup, right?
It's a picture of him, sure, but it's a weird one.
You've got to explain to me <c=#FF00FF>what</c> it is, and how it ended up looking like him.
(Might be worth <c=#FF00FF>reading up</c> at the bookshelf to find out what sort of magic was being done here.)
